지옥에서 끌어 올려준 거미줄 : a lifeline that saved me from hell

hangle: 딱히 나의 정조 관념이나 부끄럼 때문에 그러는 건 아닌데…
first_translate: it’s not because I’m shy or anything…
idiom_translate: it’s not because I’m shy or anything...
label: I’m not really that prudish about losing my virginity...

idiom_translate: and if he spends the night with another woman...
label: just the  thought of siegren spending a night with another woman...
